name: Coconuts Versus Conquerors
description:
Defend the island!

Sink attacking boats before they reach the island by aiming the auto-firing coconut cannon at them.

Earn upgrade bounties by sinking boats. Use upgrade bounties to make cannon or coconuts more powerful.

If a boat reaches the wall it's game over!

Music created by Copper Cannell, Jesse Gallagher and Dan Lebowitz.

Art assets created by Pearson Scott Foresman (Boat, Coconut and Trees) and Brockhaus Konversations-Lexikon (Hot air balloon).

Sound assets sourced from YouTube Audio Library.

Font used is Quicksand by Andrew Paglinawan.
